effect.scarlet_violet: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to burn the target. Frozen Pokémon may use this move, in which case they will thaw.
effect.the_teal_mask: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to burn the target. Frozen Pokémon may use this move, in which case they will thaw.
effect.the_indigo_disk: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to burn the target. Frozen Pokémon may use this move, in which case they will thaw.

short_effect.scarlet_violet: Has a 10% chance to burn the target. Lets frozen Pokémon thaw themselves.
short_effect.the_teal_mask: Has a 10% chance to burn the target. Lets frozen Pokémon thaw themselves.
short_effect.the_indigo_disk: Has a 10% chance to burn the target. Lets frozen Pokémon thaw themselves.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: The user attacks by cloaking itself in fire and charging at the target. This may also leave the target with a burn.
